title: Is the first world responsible for caring for the 3rd world?
body:
Generally in Africa you make lots of babies because, without aid from rich countries, most of your kids would die from starvation/disease.

Without changing Africans' culture, which is not possible or will take multiple decades of instruction from foreigners to accomplish and their population will grow contributing the Earth's overpopulation and, naturally, require MORE first aid over time.
